revised_title: The Impact of Pore Water Chemistry on Clay Soil Properties
tldr: This article explores the importance of pore water chemistry on the mechanical and engineering properties of clay soils. It discusses how changes in chemistry due to natural and anthropogenic factors can alter the strength properties of clay soils. The author emphasizes the significance of understanding the complex deformation process in clay materials and the influence of various factors on their strength.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Soil Mechanics
